website_summaries.verdict: Thinner than many other designs, this simple penlight gets the job done without a lot of fuss or extras.
pros: Thin casing cuts down on bulk
On button has a feature that allows it to either stay on constantly or only turn while holding the button, saving battery life
cons: Some units stop working after a few months

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Light
customer_reviews.text: I am a critical care paramedic - our uniforms have a very tight pen pocket on the left breast pocket - I wanted a light that was reliable and also small enough to fit my pocket THIS LIGHT IS AWESOME! - push button for temporary use (checking pupils etc) and with a twist, switched in with it holding the button I’ve had it a while and I’m still on my first set of batteries If you need a bright dependable easily carried light look no further!
customer_reviews.author: David C. Prehn

customer_reviews.title: White is a cool blue, light diffusion is poor
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of this model flashlight with different LED colors. This is for the white LED color. The white color is very cool compared to the Streamlight Stylus Pro. The Pro has a nice warmer white LED, and the reflector makes a huge difference in situations where you can use the flashlight. The diffusion of light is definitely poor, since it's just the LED sticking out of the tip. Then again, that's the price you pay for more portability than the Pro version.
customer_reviews.author: masterhankshake

customer_reviews.title: Good investment that is quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good but could be better. The design ihave a little flawe, lucky I have small hands but the push button could be at least 25% larger and more ergonomic, i thinks thats how u spell it lol. Quality is good so far but that button is... it would be nice if it came with rubber sleeve. The light output exceed those cheap $5 pen light. I wish it have high and low beam mode.
customer_reviews.author: Buggie Boo

customer_reviews.title: like a thick pen
customer_reviews.text: Very slim, like a thick pen. It's a little taller than a pen. Bright & high quality. I bought one for myself & bought again as a gift. Anyone looking for a light to carry in a shirt pocket should conceder this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: It'll give your patients an abundance of floaters.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little light, but it is way too bright to use for patients' eyes. I ended up buying another light that wasn't so bright to use for eyes, and I use this light for looking in orifices and skin. I feel like this does a much better job of showing actual color as opposed to other penlights when you need more focused light to look at skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier in TX

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pocket/pencil light
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pocket/pencil light. Use it pretty much everyday at the hospital. Fits in the pocket like a pen. Very handy. Going on a year and still on the same set of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly bright
customer_reviews.text: I love that this pen is so slim, lightweight and bright!
customer_reviews.author: May Latte

customer_reviews.title: Make the shields more opaque!!
customer_reviews.text: The eye shields on these lights vary in quality. Please improve them! I have had three and only the first one protected my eyes sufficiently. The others were less opaque and fairly useless therefore.
customer_reviews.author: Los Angeles

customer_reviews.title: Have bought again and again!
customer_reviews.text: Used in healthcare. Another one of those items I've lent out and dont get returned it's that good. I have repurchased twice. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Justina N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works as intended for what I do at work.
customer_reviews.author: Hot_Tamale!

customer_reviews.title: Quality Penlight
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these for 10 years now and it still works flawlessly despite being dropped numerous times, soakings and overall general neglect while being used daily for a couple years. This is the most durable flashlight I've ever owned. Because of it's durability I bought a second one. This light is a steal at $13.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: my favorite penlight at work
customer_reviews.text: my favorite penlight at work. Had used many different brand including penlight in the 70$ range. But none beats this one for physical examinations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light - comes with batteries - I use this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light - comes with batteries - I use this to inspect automobile paint and scratches - works best in the dark or similar environment. Nice weight to and balance.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Platt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Egg Candler
customer_reviews.text: This item came with a glare guard cap, making it perfect for handling lizard eggs, also checking gender on the babies. So far the best thing I've used for such.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Durable pen light MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: water tight and has been dropped from about 25 feet and other distances and still works. Great little pen light. This light is very powerful and will not let you down if you like to carry a small pen light.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: so bright!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for an emergency med kit for the trunk of my car. When I got it I immediately opened the pack to check to see how bright it was. In full light in my living room it lit up a wall almost 10 feet away! this is going to be a great asset in my med kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Fultz

customer_reviews.title: Shine a light on me
customer_reviews.text: Great light for inspecting gun bores and engine cylinder wear.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K

customer_reviews.title: the light is super bright. but you have to hold a button ...
customer_reviews.text: the light is super bright. but you have to hold a button for it to stay on.. it doesn't click and stay on.. very annoying. maybe even a 2 star.. its also super long for no reason..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I carry it in my shirt pocket for easy access. I liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: This flashlight I use daily for work, I carry it in my shirt pocket for easy access. I liked it so much, I purchased one for the home.
customer_reviews.author: Dooms

customer_reviews.title: Not really a stylus, but more just a pen ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really a stylus, but more just a pen light to take on worksites and such. It is well-built, but I am not going to use it on my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Saari

customer_reviews.title: Great penlight, great value.
customer_reviews.text: The penlight works really well. I like that it comes with an attachment that helps funnel the light for different uses. The light seems well constructed and durable for use with my job. I am veer pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joenun

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, very bright and fits perfectly in my shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: SSKevinSC

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: Use for light painting and exceeded my expectations. The main reason I purchased was for the snoot which hides the bulb and concentrates the light.
customer_reviews.author: IACA-Photos

customer_reviews.title: Sun on a Stick
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and a great addition to your light source arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: one of my best pocket additions
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thin penlight. just about the size of a regular pencil and really bright! works perfectly in any situation.
customer_reviews.author: GRM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at first because of the price but the build quality is phenomenal
customer_reviews.author: M1CAH4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright for its size, not bulky in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Dane B.

customer_reviews.title: This is great but very touchy on where the cap has to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great but very touchy on where the cap has to be tightened for it to work sometimes. Im a nursing student and it works great on seeing pupil responses and mucous membranes.
customer_reviews.author: ky_stock

customer_reviews.title: Handy size to have
customer_reviews.text: I work maintenance at a hospital and carry it in my shirt pocket everywhere I go. Lot's of light for a small penlight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Handiest penlight flashlight I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I've used it hundreds of times in just the last month. Since the first time I used it I've wondered how I ever got along without it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stratz

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated.
customer_reviews.text: Specialty item. I wish it had a feater to stay on all the time. Quality is very good. didn't get five stars because I don't know of a competitor to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very handy lights
customer_reviews.text: I use them mostly for mechanic work but carry one all the time. They have been a lifesaver for me.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Duncan

customer_reviews.title: quadruple a batteries are sooo cure!
customer_reviews.text: I will keep loosing these. And I will keep buying the same one. Only wish it was a little shorter, like a pen. Its a little tall in the shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: STREAMLIGHT 65058 STYLUS 6-1/4 INCH PENLIGHT WITH POCKET CLIP
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PENLIGHT. I KEEP IT IN MY POCKET AND ITS THERE WHEN I NEED IT. IT IS HANDY TO USE WHEN I REPAIRING MY MACHINERY.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Riechers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good quality. I returned this light as soon as I opened it. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Vova

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a great tool to have when working with a touch screen tablet or handheld
customer_reviews.author: softball31

customer_reviews.title: Blinding!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Nursing student and purchased this for use in my labs and Clinicals. While it works fine for assessing the mouth and nose, it is too bright for eyes. I will not be using it for fear of harming someone. It might make a good flashlight, but it is NOT the choice for physical assessments!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: BRight little light!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little light! it is very bright and durable.
customer_reviews.author: David Brewer

product_meta.title: Streamlight 65058 Stylus 3-AAAA LED Pen Light, Black with White LED UL Listed, 6-1/4-Inch - 11 Lumens
product_meta.description: This bright LED penlight has a battery life 20x greater than a standard flashlight and goes anywhere you need it. Body available in Black, Gold, Silver, US Flag, Red or Blue. High-intensity 100,000 hour LED available in Artic White, Flame Red (624nm), Ice Blue (470nm), Navigation Green (527nm), Ultraviolet (365nm), or Infrared (880nm). White: 140 candela peak beam intensity, 24m beam distance and 11 lumens measured system output. Blue: 110 candela peak beam intensity, 21m beam distance and 2 lumens measured system output. Red: 53 candela peak beam intensity, 15m beam distance and 2 lumens measured system output. Green: 59 candela peak beam intensity, 15m beam distance and 7 lumens measured system output. UV: 3.8 mW measured system output. IR: 12 mW/sr measured system output. See model for specific LED selection. 3 "AAAA" size alkaline batteries. Features a momentary blink switch and constant on. Runs up to 24 continuous hours to the 10% lumen output level. IPX4 Rated for water resistant operation. Individually serialized. Pocket clip. Includes Glare Guard protector. 6.21-Inch x 0.375-Inch (15.17 x .95 cm) 1.1 oz (31.19 g). Assembled in USA.
feature_bullets: Body available in Black, Gold, Silver, US Flag, Red or Blue
High-intensity 100,000 hour LED available in Artic White, Flame Red (624nm), Ice Blue (470nm), Navigation Green (527nm), Ultraviolet (365nm), or Infrared (880nm)
Features a momentary blink switch and constant on
Runs up to 24 continuous hours to the 10% lumen output level
This item is a flashlight and not a laser pointer
Water-proof, machined aluminum case;anodized finish with non-slip, knurled grip
High intensity LED solid state bulb which lasts 100,000 hours
